title: Problem 2059_B
statement: You are given an array a of length n and an even integer k (2 ≤ k ≤ n). You need to split the array a into exactly k non-empty subarrays^{\dagger} such that each element of the array a belongs to exactly one subarray.Next, all subarrays with even indices (second, fourth, ..., k-th) are concatenated into a single array b.
